Text.Page:
Did you just get off the pegasus?

Lucky you, getting to travel. Lucky pegasus! Travels all the time. Travel...I traveled before... Before the grindy gritty gears of Velika, I basked in the moonlight and glow fruit of Pora Elinu.

Hey, you travel! Have you been to Pora Elinu? Did you know I used to live there?

Done reminiscing.
